shortDescription: Multiple camera devices by UDP Technology, Geutebr√ºck and other vendors are vulnerable to command injection, which may allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code.
vulnerabilityName: geutebruck g-cam_ebc-2110 Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
